mapper.update: update freeboard set f_title = #{f_title}, f_content = #{f_content}, f_writer = #{f_writer}, f_udate = sysdate where f_no = #{f_no}
mapper.select: select f_no, f_title, f_content, f_writer, f_count, f_date, f_udate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(freeboard pk_free) */ rownum rn, f_no, f_title, f_content, f_writer, f_count, f_date, f_udate from freeboard where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum } - 1) * #{amount}
